idea-plugin.name: Tanne Theme
idea-plugin.description: Eye comforting dark green theme for JetBrains IDEs.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.3.0

  • Changed #344644 to a slightly more saturated #384d48
  • Migrated colors to leverage the color variable system
  • Unified and styled scrollbars

0.2.1

  • Fixed faulty color replacement
  • Changed Java static method color to green
  • Changed Markdown code block color to blue
  • Changed whitespace color to text color
  • Changed property color to inherit keyword color (red)
  • Added inlay hint colors

0.2.0

  • Fixed supported IDEA version
  • Swapped default text with identifier color
  • Improved brightness of #99BDB5 and #8AA8A2 to #A8C7C0
